mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM (SELECT B.BSEQ, B.BCODE, B.ID, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT , B.IMG, B.HIT, B.REGDATE, B.NOTICE, M.NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.ID = M.ID WHERE B.BCODE = #{bcode} ORDER BY B.REGDATE DESC) S) B WHERE B.RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum}*10-9 AND #{pageNum}*10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUE(BSEQ, BCODE, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, IMG, HIT, REGDATE) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{bcode},#{id},#{title},#{content},#{img},0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT B.BSEQ, B.BCODE, B.ID, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT , B.IMG, B.HIT, B.REGDATE, B.NOTICE, M.NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.ID = M.ID WHERE B.BSEQ = #{bseq}
SELECT ME.MSEQ, ME.BSEQ, ME.ID, ME.CONTENT, ME.REGDATE, M.NAME FROM MEMO ME JOIN MEMBER M ON ME.ID = M.ID WHERE ME.BSEQ = #{bseq} ORDER BY ME.REGDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ME.MSEQ, ME.BSEQ, ME.ID, ME.CONTENT, ME.REGDATE, M.NAME FROM MEMO ME JOIN MEMBER M ON ME.ID = M.ID WHERE ME.BSEQ = #{bseq} ORDER BY ME.REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM (SELECT B.BSEQ, B.BCODE, B.ID, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT , B.IMG, B.HIT, B.REGDATE, B.NOTICE, M.NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.ID = M.ID WHERE B.BCODE = #{bcode} AND B.IMG IS NOT NULL ORDER BY B.REGDATE DESC) S) B WHERE B.RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum}*10-9 AND #{pageNum}*10
